author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
Today, J and Ben are drawing crazy Harry Potter theories out of a hat and must defend them as if they were real!
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp. Go to http://betterhelp.com/super for 10% off your first month.
Go to http://factormeals.com/super50off and use code super50off to get 50% off your first box, plus Free Breakfast for 1 Year.

Can they source info to prove Hermione is a Death Eater? Kreacher is Dobby’s Father? That the Weasley twins were adopted? And What if Neville actually IS the chosen one..?

#SuperCarlinBrothers #HarryPotter

Written by: J & Ben Carlin
Edited by: Isybelle Christley

Super Carlin Brothers explore Harry Potter theories, Pixar connections, and all your favorite fandoms every week!
